meanings: (주먹·멱살 등을) hold, clasp, clutch; (주먹을) clench; (손으로 단단히 잡다) grasp, grip; (옷·멱살 등을) seize (sb by sth)
snatch a handbag from her hand

phrases.phrase: 칼날 쥔 놈이 자루 쥔 놈을 당할까
meanings: (속담) It is better to be the hammer than the anvil.

vlive.korean: [물병 쥔 지 3초 만에 깨닫는 현실의 벽] 이거는 손을 올리기도 힘들어. It's hard to have my hands here... 듣기 View video 세이브펫챌린지 SAVE PET CHALLENGE : 블락비 재효! 검은개 프로젝 세이브펫챌린지에 도전하다 [세이브펫챌린] 15
vlive.english: It's hard to have my hands here...

examples.korean: He smacked a fist into the palm of his hand. 발음듣기 그가 주먹쥔 손을 한 쪽 손바닥에 대고 탁 쳤다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He smacked a fist into the palm of his hand. 발음

examples.korean: The dictator refuses to relax his grip on power. 발음듣기 독재자는 권력을 쥔 손을 놓으려고 하지 않는다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The dictator refuses to relax his grip on power. 발음

examples.korean: His hold on her arm tightened. 발음듣기 그녀의 팔을 쥔 그의 손에 힘이 들어갔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His hold on her arm tightened. 발음

examples.korean: Who holds the purse rules the house. 발음듣기 돈 주머니 쥔 자가 가정를 지배한다. (서양속담, 돈속담) 명언/속담
examples.english: Who holds the purse rules the house. 발음

examples.korean: relinquish one's hold of a rope 발음듣기 밧줄을 쥔 손을 놓다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: relinquish one's hold of a rope 발음
